title: Snowed In with the Quarterback
description: The superstar quarterback who was just elected sexiest man alive? The man who’s the only reason you watch football?The one with all the gorgeous brown skin, the piles of muscles on muscles, that panty-melting dimple, and the soulful eyes? Yes, that fine piece of male a$$. He’s my soon-to-be ex-husband...But when a schedule mix-up and a winter storm get us snowed-in, stuck together in the vacation home we normally take turns visiting, old flames reignite and it’s suddenly difficult to remember why we thought our love was gone…Read along for a sweet and steamy second chance romance between two soulmates who thought they lost their bond, till fate throws them back together!This is a safe read with no cheating, no cliffhanger, and a guaranteed happily ever after.Mature content. Only suited for readers 18 and older.
author: Imani Jay
